name: Star Sled
description: This project was created for the 2 buttons game jam.  In this game, you must effectively use your JUMP and SHOOT actions to evade enemy attacks, and shoot them down before they manage to get passed you.  If a comet or robot manages to get by you, the Earth's defenses will take a hit!  Will you succeed in saving the Earth from impending doom?  Try to get a good score while you're at it!
